text: A wild new story claims that Katie Holmes broke up with Jamie Foxx for her former “ Dawson ’ s Creek ” co - star Joshua Jackson, but it simply isn ’ t true. The “ Dawson ’ s Creek ” stars did reunite recently for an Entertainment Weekly cover, but reports that they rekindled a supposed on - again / off - again romance at the photo shoot... are bogus. Gossip Cop spoke with reps for Katie and Josh, and confirmed that the story is false. For more rumor busts, visit GossipCop. com.
